raw_body: Beloved wife of late Quintus, loving mother of Krishni and Ruvini. mother-in-law of Mark Laurence and Lasantha Goonetilleke, much loved grandmother of Lasanthi and Eshanthi, expired remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 5.00 p.m. till 8.00 p.m. on Tuesday 20th February and from 9.00 a.m. till 11.00 a.m. on Wednesday 21st Februarу followed by burial at the Gene
